nodes.text: Zygian's Banking Concern in Mos Eisley, on the planet Tatooine was a branch office of Zygian's Banking Concern, a savings and loan corporation whose headquarters was on Treylon II. The branch was managed by Givvers circa 0 ABY. It offered 15% interest loans, which compared to typical Mos Eisley loan shark rates of 300% or more was a good deal. People skipping out on their payments were a constant problem, to the point where the branch opened up an unofficial pawn shop selling collateral goods left behind.
